steps.title: Make Star Wars into
steps.description: Use a loop to make the Star Wars title shrink

components.text: Add the following script to your **title** sprite
components.blocks:
when FLAG clicked
 show 
 set size to (100) %
   go to x: (0) y: (0)
 point in direction [0 v] 
 repeat (100) 
	 move (0.001) steps 
	 change size by (-1) 
	 wait (0.01) secs 
end 
 broadcast [start v] 
 go to x: (0) y: (0)
hide

components.text: **Click the Green Flag** - Does Star Wars start in the middle of the screen and then disappear into the distance?

steps.title: Zoom in on planet
steps.description: We will make it look like we are zooming in on a desert planet

components.text: Add this code to the **planet** sprite:
components.blocks:
when FLAG clicked
go to x: (-100) y: (100)
 set size to (0) %
 hide

components.text: Now also add the code to make the planet zoom in:
components.blocks:
when I receive [planet v] 
point towards [title v] 
 repeat (100) 
	 move (1) steps 
	 change size by (1) 
 end 
 hide 
 switch backdrop to [desert v] 
 broadcast [desert v]

components.text: **Click the Green Flag** - Does it look like we are zooming in on the planet?

steps.title: Add a droid
steps.description: BB8 has lost his master, let's make an animation to show this

components.text: Add this code to the **BB8** sprite:
components.blocks:
when FLAG clicked 
go to x: (-100) y: (100)  
 hide

components.text: Now lets make BB8 move and talk using this code:
components.blocks:
when I receive [desert v] 
 show 
 say [Where is my master?] for (2) secs 
 set rotation style [left-right v] 
 repeat (50) 
	 repeat (3) 
		 move (3) steps 
		 if on edge bounce 
	 end 
	  next costume 
 end 
 broadcast [tie v]

steps.title: TIE Fighter!
steps.description: Now we will get the TIE fighter to fly around and shoot at BB8

components.text: Add this code to the **TIE** sprite:
components.blocks:
when FLAG clicked 
 set rotation style [left-right v] 
 go to x: (-200) y: (130) 
 hide

components.text: Now lets make the TIE fighter fly and shoot using this code:
components.blocks:
when I receive [tie v] 
 show 
 point in direction (90 v) 
 repeat (100) 
	 move (10) steps 
	 if on edge bounce 
 end 
 point towards [BB8 v] 
 broadcast [fire v]

steps.title: Lasers!
steps.description: The TIE fighter shoots lasers, we need to make the laser shoot at BB8

components.text: Select the **laser** sprite and click on the **Scripts** tab and add this code:
Now lets make the laser fly towards BB8, add the code:
components.blocks:
when I receive [fire v] 
 go to [TIE v] 
 point towards [BB8 v] 
 show 
 set size to (0) %
 repeat until < touching [BB8 v] ?> 
	 move (10) steps 
	 change size by (1) 
 end 
 broadcast [hit v]

steps.title: Run away!
steps.description: BB8 gets scared, let's make him run away

components.text: Go back to the **BB8** sprite and add this code:
components.blocks:
when I receive [hit v] 
 say [Ahhhh....] for (2) secs 
 repeat (80) 
	 repeat (2) 
		 move (5) steps 
	 end 
	  next costume 
 end 
 hide
